key.name: priority
key.summary: Priority to use for this plugin
key.description: Priority to use for this plugin in unity-settings-daemon startup queue

key.name: active
key.description: Whether this plugin would be activated by unity-settings-daemon or not

key.name: removal-action
key.description: Set this to one of “none”, “lock-screen”, or “force-logout”. The action will get performed when the smartcard used for log in is removed.

key.name: bell-mode
key.description: Possible values are “on”, “off”, and “custom”.

key.name: bell-custom-file
key.description: File name of the bell sound to be played.

key.name: remember-numlock-state
key.description: When set to true, GNOME will remember the state of the NumLock LED between sessions.

key.name: numlock-state
key.description: The remembered state of the NumLock LED.

key.name: locate-pointer
key.summary: Highlights the current location of the pointer when the Control key is pressed and released.

key.name: double-click
key.description: Length of a double click in milliseconds.

key.name: drag-threshold
key.description: Distance before a drag is started.

key.name: orientation-lock
key.summary: Whether the tablet’s orientation is locked, or rotated automatically.

key.name: hotplug-command
key.description: Command to be run when a device is added or removed. An exit value of 1 means that the device will not be handled further by gnome-settings-daemon.

key.name: left-handed
key.description: Swap left and right mouse buttons for left-handed mice.

key.name: motion-acceleration
key.description: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default.

key.name: motion-threshold
key.description: Distance in pixels the pointer must move before accelerated mouse motion is activated. A value of -1 is the system default.

key.name: middle-button-enabled
key.description: Enables middle mouse button emulation through simultaneous left and right button click.

key.name: repeat-interval
key.description: Delay between repeats in milliseconds.

key.name: delay
key.description: Initial key repeat delay in milliseconds.

key.name: disable-while-typing
key.description: Set this to TRUE if you have problems with accidentally hitting the touchpad while typing.

key.name: horiz-scroll-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to allow horizontal scrolling by the same method selected with the scroll_method key.

key.name: scroll-method
key.description: Select the touchpad scroll method. Supported values are: “disabled”, “edge-scrolling”, “two-finger-scrolling”.

key.name: tap-to-click
key.description: Set this to TRUE to be able to send mouse clicks by tapping on the touchpad.

key.name: touchpad-enabled
key.description: Set this to TRUE to enable all touchpads.

key.name: left-handed
key.description: Swap left and right mouse buttons for left-handed mice with “left”, “right” for right-handed, “mouse” to follow the mouse setting.

key.name: motion-acceleration
key.description: Acceleration multiplier for mouse motion. A value of -1 is the system default.

key.name: motion-threshold
key.description: Distance in pixels the pointer must move before accelerated mouse motion is activated. A value of -1 is the system default.

key.name: natural-scroll
key.description: Set this to TRUE to enable natural (reverse) scrolling for touchpads.

key.name: scroll-wheel-emulation-button
key.summary: Mouse wheel emulation button. 0 to disable the feature.
